messages.title: Change in Coventry South
messages.content: Labour's tax on jobs will kill the recovery. The re-election of Gordon Brown's government - with more debt, waste and taxes - will bring us a new recession.

messages.title: Backing the NHS
messages.content: The NHS is our number one priority. We back it and we want to improve it for everyone. The Conservatives will increase spending on the NHS every year.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reduce debt and waste, cut the tax on jobs.
Increase NHS spending every year, focus on areas such as cancer survival rates.

issues.economy: The re-election of Gordon Brown's government - with more debt, waste and taxes - will bring us a new recession.
issues.health: The NHS is our number one priority. We back it and we want to improve it for everyone.

housing.content: Labour's tax on jobs will kill the recovery.

images.caption: Kevin with David Cameron at his Commons Office.
Kevin with Conservative colleagues taking the fight against Hospital Car Parking Charges to the Department for Health in Westminster.
Kevin taking part in a charity rock climbing event to raise funds for the Terence Higgins Trust a charity leading the fight against HIV/AIDS.
Kevin helping collect 'Surprise Supplies' packages for British Soldiers serving overseas. Nearly 100 troops received a package reminding them of home thanks to local residents.
